ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 151
ygData.msgSnippet: I was thinking about a High Elf Enchanter :) I just had an evil thought for a PVP server- I know everyone s heard about the body caomping that had/is going on,
ygData.messageBody:
I was thinking about a High Elf Enchanter :)

I just had an evil thought for a PVP server- I know everyone's heard about the
body caomping that had/is going on, but what about hanging out at the evac
sites? This would work especially well for and enchanter- you see them before
they get updates to their screen- so you could tashan/i/ia, charm one member
then sick it on the rest as they zone. Mes the others not being attacked, and
then gate out before they really have any idea what hit them.

Well, this IS a cheat list? That sounds pretty close to one :)
